summary: WHEEL ASSEMBLY APPEARS TO HAVE COMPLETELY GIVEN OUT.  VEHICLE TRAVELING AT ~35MPH WHEN IT ROSE SLIGHTLY THEN GAVE OUT.  VEHICLE HIT SIDE OF PARKED CAR AND FLIPPED ON TO SIDE AND INTO RETAINING WALL - FULL SIDE CURTAIN AIRBAG DEPLOYMENT.  ENTIRE FRONT PASSENGER WHEEL WELL COMPLETELY VACANT. EVERYTHING LAYING ON STREET INCLUDING SUSPENSION SPRINGS. WITNESS TO SUPPORT EVENTS.    VEHICLE UNDER 25K MILES (2011 MODEL, INCIDENT 2012).  VEHICLE TOTALED BY INSURANCE. *TR
